source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.
source_objects.title: Leadership

items.title: Be an Agent for Positive Change: Positivity Strategies

visible_instructors.name: Robyn
visible_instructors.title: Robyn Stratton-Berkessel
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Speaker, Designer and Facilitator of Positive Change

items.headline: An uplifting framework to strengthen leadership: the latest in brain science, positive emotions and appreciative inquiry
objectives_summary: Confidence to be that agent for positive change you so desire to be.
The 5-step Positive Change Framework, known as Appreciative Inquiry, for every time you chose to make a change or change a habit.
Detailed worksheets you can fill out on-line or download to use again and again in the future.

items.title: Master Your Public Speaking - Fully Accredited Course
items.headline: Diploma Course For Easy & Effective Techniques For Successful Public Speaking - Hypnotherapy for Overcoming Your Blocks!
objectives_summary: Understand the key elements of Successful Public Speaking
Know about the tools needed for Successful talks
Understand how to banish the fear of Public Speaking

items.title: Emotional Intelligence for Leadership
items.headline: Transform yourself and your organization for bottom line results
objectives_summary: Apply the principles of Emotionally Intelligent Leadership to create high performance in your organization
Understand and apply the Three Core Elements of Self-Differentiated Leadership
Understand and apply the Five Characteristics of Chronically Anxious Systems

items.title: A Practical Guide to Healthy Relationships
items.headline: The complete training to nurture healthy relationships at work and at home
objectives_summary: Discover unhealthy relationships patterns and how to overcome them
Learn about the communicating and listening barriers that compromise your relationships
Discover an actionable framework for nurturing genuine and trustworthy relationships

items.title: How to Manage Difficult People
items.headline: Proven strategies to identify and understand awkward and challenging behaviours and how to manage them
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to deal with difficult staff, customers, colleagues and your boss.

items.title: Leadership Skills Mastery Vol. 2:  Leadership for 2019
items.headline: 7 Leadership Qualities and Leadership Skills Every Leader Ought to Develop - Modern Leadership Training and Development
objectives_summary: DEVELOP Rock Solid Confidence in Your Ability to Lead Others
INFLUENCE People and Situations With Greater Control and Accuracy
BECOME More Decisive and Make Better Decisions

items.title: How to communicate with more Influence & Impact
items.headline: The subconscious secrets to ethical persuasion
objectives_summary: How to connect with anyone, anywhere
How to think like a master of influence
How to craft your message for specific personality types

items.title: Leadership Lessons from the US Marines | Teamwork
items.headline: How to ensure your team produces superior results with mutual trust and respect.
objectives_summary: Build a winning team with your employees that produces superior results
Create a culture of teamwork
Foster collaboration with your employees

items.title: Effective Communication Motivational Interviewing Part 2
items.headline: Effective Communication and Motivational Interviewing
objectives_summary: You will learn more about Motivational Interviewing as a skill set
Learn about deep empathy and the impact it can have on communication
Learn about strategic reflective listening in regards to behavior change

items.headline: The ultimate vocal training bootcamp - make your voice powerful, authoritative, and attractive.
objectives_summary: The evolutionary foundation behind modern social hierarchies
How to hack your voice to speak louder
How to break down the three different styles of vocal tonality

items.title: Leadership Development: Manager Training, Personal Success
items.headline: Life purpose, Personal Development, Focus Mastery, Personal Transformation, Personal Success, & Leadership Development.
objectives_summary: Types of Leadership
Leadership Framework
Leadership Core Values

items.title: The Art of Communicating

visible_instructors.name: Brent
visible_instructors.title: Brent Dalley
visible_instructors.job_title: Trainer in: Leadership,  Marketing, Family Counseling

items.headline: What You Say and How You Say It Makes All The Difference Whether In the Way You Speak and Write, or Sit, Stand and Smile
objectives_summary: You will learn to speak with greater clarity and conviction.
You will learn how to write correspondence whether a letter or email that will set the tone that you desire with the recipient.
You will learn the important skill of  how to communicate with various personality types for greater understanding.
